functions.name: createAccount
functions.description: Creates a new cloud file account in Thunderbird. If the account already exists, it will not be recreated.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The cloud file provider type, e.g., 'ext-tbpro-addon-stage@thunderbird.net'.

parameters.name: configured
parameters.description: Whether the account should be marked as configured.

accountId.description: The ID of the created cloud file account.

alreadyExists.description: True if the account already existed and was not recreated.

error.description: Error message if the operation failed.
